content.raw:
@{557058:490c665b-b69c-40f3-80ea-64f20747efc4} Sorry for the delayed response, I was able to reproduce this issue in the corners.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/2836280852-Screenshot_from_2019-11-01_11-49-18.png)
‌

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/1687213997-Screenshot_from_2019-11-01_11-47-59.png)
‌

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/2353795970-Screenshot_from_2019-11-01_11-47-01.png)
‌

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/1343500012-Screenshot_from_2019-11-01_11-48-33.png)
‌

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/3211888543-Screenshot_from_2019-11-01_11-50-04.png)
@{5cf75629ff02b50ea27b2817} It appears that the front right and front left corners of the qualification starting area do not allow you to request robot position while being in the staging location \(back left, back right are fine\). Also you can request global pose from _just inside_ the testing environment \(this probably has no impact but good for awareness\).  I could not request global positioning data from even the nearest point in the corner after the starting descent \(as expected\).
content.html:
@Martin Dlouhy Sorry for the delayed response, I was able to reproduce this issue in the corners.

‌

‌

‌

‌

@Alfredo Bencomo It appears that the front right and front left corners of the qualification starting area do not allow you to request robot position while being in the staging location (back left, back right are fine). Also you can request global pose from just inside the testing environment (this probably has no impact but good for awareness). I could not request global positioning data from even the nearest point in the corner after the starting descent (as expected).
